courses.name: Python
courses.description: Python is a programming language that lets you work quickly and integrate systems more effectively. It's used for web development, data science, and much more. Python is easy to learn and has a lot of great libraries and resources to help you get started.

courses.name: JavaScript
courses.description: JavaScript is a programming language that lets you interact with the world around you. It is used for web development, games, and much more. JavaScript is easy to learn and has a lot of great libraries and resources to help you get started.

courses.name: C#
courses.description: C# is a programming language that lets you work quickly and integrate systems more effectively. It's used for web development, data science, and much more. C# is easy to learn and has a lot of great libraries and resources to help you get started.
